title: Realizing the value
of daily life and technology
description: Based on blockchain and AI technologies, in the field of fintech,
we lead digital transformation (DX) and connect all aspects of daily life
to deliver new experiences and the true value of technology

content: We aim to build the world's first unified identity verification system, creating a platform of equal opportunities based on this foundation and becoming a global leader in the field
We help individuals and businesses connect safely and freely within the global digital environment

card.title: CHALLENGE
card.content: We begin by overcoming the limitations of global identity verification

card.title: INNOVATION
card.content: We offer solutions with the stability and convenience of blockchain technology

card.title: CONTINUE
card.content: We connect global services and build a sustainable digital ecosystem

AboutNews.title: Press Release
AboutNews.error: An error occurred while loading news.

pressItems.title: CrossHub Raises 800 Million KRW Seed Investment from 4 Investors
pressItems.preview: CrossHub, a blockchain-based next-generation identity authentication and payment solution company, announced on the 13th that it has successfully raised seed investment from four domestic investors.

pressItems.title: CrossHub Exports Digital Identification and Payment Solutions to Thailand
pressItems.preview: CrossHub, a fintech and blockchain-based digital identity authentication and payment solution company, signed a supply contract with Blockfint, a leading fintech company in Thailand, at the "Techsauce Global Summit 2025" site in Bangkok, Thailand.

pressItems.title: Crosshub Exports IDBlock Solution to Laos' TB Tech
pressItems.preview: Crosshub has signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) with Laos' digital solution specialist TB Tech to export its IDBlock solution for 120,000 USD (approximately 17 billion won).

pressItems.title: Crosshub wins Grand Prize at Financial Services Commission's Fintech IR for 'Foreign Identity Authentication and Payment Support'
pressItems.preview: Crosshub, a startup developing blockchain-based identity authentication and simple payment services, announced on the 1st that it won the Grand Prize at the 'First Half 2025 Fintech-specialized IR (Corporate Briefing)' hosted by the Financial Services Commission.

pressItems.title: Crosshub Selected for SMBA Global Collaboration Program
pressItems.preview: Crosshub announced on the 24th that it has been selected for the 'Global Collaboration Program' hosted by the Ministry of SMEs and Startups.

pressItems.title: Busan CCEI Concludes Japan Open Innovation Program 'Plug in: Tokyo'
pressItems.preview: The Busan Center for Creative Economy & Innovation (CEO Yongwoo Kim, hereinafter referred to as Busan CCEI) announced that it successfully concluded the global open innovation program ‘Plug in: Tokyo,’ held in Tokyo, Japan from May 7 to 10. The program was conducted in collaboration with seven national innovation centers and 10 promising startups, marking a meaningful step in supporting Korean startups’ expansion into the Japanese market.

pressItems.title: Seoul Fintech Lab creates 4,000 jobs over 7 years
pressItems.preview: Just being located in Seoul Fintech Lab is seen as a mark of business credibility. It attracts much more attention and opportunity than seeking investment alone.

pressItems.title: Seoul Fintech Lab Resident 'Crosshub' Gains Attention as a Fintech-Tourism Convergence Company
pressItems.preview: 'Crosshub', a resident of the Seoul Fintech Lab—a startup hub operated by the Seoul Metropolitan Government—was recently selected for both the Korea Credit Guarantee Fund's 'Little Penguin' program and the Seoul Tourism Startup program by the Seoul Tourism Organization.

pressItems.title: Crosshub sets out to build borderless identity, payment ecosystem
pressItems.preview: Vietnam, Japan among first stops in Korean startup's global expansion drive

pressItems.title: Seoul Selects 5 Promising 'Tourism Startups'… Up to 70 Million KRW in Support
pressItems.preview: On April 18, the Seoul Metropolitan Government announced that it has selected five promising tourism startups through the '2025 Seoul Tourism Startup Collaboration Project' in partnership with the Seoul Tourism Organization. The audition drew applications from 152 companies, resulting in a 30:1 competition ratio.

pressItems.title: CrossHub Selected for Credit Guarantee Fund's 'Little Penguin' Program
pressItems.preview: CrossHub, currently developing next-generation 4th-gen hybrid identity authentication service (ID Block) and a global cross-border easy payment service (Block Pay), announced that it has been selected for the Credit Guarantee Fund's promising startup support program 'Little Penguin'.

pressItems.title: Woori Financial Group Opens Blockchain Startup Hub in Busan
pressItems.preview: Woori Financial Group has established the first blockchain-specialized startup incubator in the Korean financial sector, strategically utilizing Busan's advantage as the nation's only blockchain regulatory free zone.

pressItems.title: Blockchain & Fintech Startup Hub Opens at Busan Station
pressItems.preview: A new facility to foster startups in blockchain and fintech sectors has opened in Busan. The hub is expected to become a regional innovation center that offers companies stable investment and growth opportunities.

pressItems.title: Gwangju Attracts Promising AI Companies – Anticipating Mobility and Other Synergies
pressItems.preview: Gwangju is intensifying its efforts to build an AI industrial cluster and attract businesses, strengthening its position as a leading AI city by drawing in energy, fintech, and other innovative companies.

pressItems.title: Seoul Holds Fintech Industry Support Forum – Listens to Resident Companies
pressItems.preview: On March 5, 2025, the Seoul Metropolitan Government held a forum at Seoul Fintech Lab in Yeouido to support the fintech industry. Mayor Oh Se-hoon and representatives from fintech companies and financial authorities discussed current issues and development strategies.

pressItems.title: The Need for Next-Generation Hybrid Identity Authentication
pressItems.preview: May 2020 marked a significant turning point in identity authentication, as the National Assembly passed a bill to amend the Electronic Signature Act, abolishing the monopoly of the long-dominant public certification system and opening the market to private authentication services.

pressItems.title: 'ID Block' Wins Grand Prize at 2025 Global Startup Competition
pressItems.preview: CrossHub once again proved its innovation by winning the grand prize at the 2025 Global Startup Competition. The event was co-hosted by BoxLadder, Peking University, and UK investment firm Simsan Ventures, and brought together top startups from around the world.

pressItems.title: CrossHub – A Company Providing Blockchain-Based Identity Authentication Services
pressItems.preview: CrossHub is a company providing blockchain-based identity authentication services. It was co-founded by Park Soo-jung (age 31) in May 2024.

pressItems.title: Daejeon Innovation Center and Taiwan's i2i Host First Global Online Demo Day of the Year
pressItems.preview: The Daejeon Center for Creative Economy & Innovation, in collaboration with Taiwanese startup accelerator i2i (Industry to Innovation), held the first global online demo day of the year, 'IP2 Launchpad', offering Korean startups opportunities to enter the Taiwanese market.

pressItems.title: Korea Early Investment Accelerator Association Hosts 7th KAIA Clubhouse
pressItems.preview: The Korea Early Investment Accelerator Association (KAIA) successfully hosted its 7th KAIA Clubhouse event on December 4.

pressItems.title: GA Korea Group and Sungkyunkwan University Host 'KINGO-GA Startup Competition'
pressItems.preview: GA Korea Group has partnered with Sungkyunkwan University to support young entrepreneurs in Korea. The 2024 KINGO-GA Startup Competition was recently held at the GA Korea Plaza in Giheung-gu, Yongin City.

pressItems.title: CrossHub Signs Supply Contract with Vietnam's 'Amoeba'
pressItems.preview: CrossHub has signed a contract with Vietnam's solution provider 'Amoeba' to supply 600,000 units of its blockchain-based decentralized identity (DID) authentication solution, ID Block.

pressItems.title: Daejeon Innovation Center Supports Startup Entry into Vietnam at 'TechFest 2024'
pressItems.preview: The Daejeon Center for Creative Economy & Innovation announced that it will support local startups entering the Vietnamese market by participating in 'TechFest 2024', Vietnam's largest tech innovation expo, to be held from November 26 for three days in Haiphong.

pressItems.title: CrossHub Raises 200M KRW Investment – Plans to Expand Hiring
pressItems.preview: CrossHub, a blockchain company specializing in digital identity (DID), has secured seed funding from a domestic group of professional investors (AC). The company was valued at 1 billion KRW and raised 200 million KRW in funding.
